page.title: 13Folk Dance Festival
page.content: When it's wet weather we often do Country Dancing in the hall. Mr Finch has the music on cassette and he teaches us the steps. It is really good fun. And every year, around May Day, the schools meet at Wethersfield and we have the{US Air Force gym.}The programme lasts all day and you get quite tired; Mr Finch says 'You aren't here to be{wallflowers}!'. We made our own skirts and neckerchiefs in class and they look nice. We used to have recorded music but this year there was a{band}of three, which was great. They played Yellow Rose of Texas, and I Want to be near You etc. When it's square or long sets we try to stick together; I feel shy. But when it's huge circles (some inside others) you really have to{mix up. I suppose it's really a good way to make new friends.
